message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $18,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Alice, your product is interesting, but $18,000 is far more than I'm willing to pay. I'm offering $10,000. This is my top limit. Let me know if you're willing to work with that.
Bob, I understand your position, but $18,000 is closer to the value this product offers. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $14,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $12,000. This is my final offer, let me know if you're interested.
